column1: For the best editing experience, upload this .csv as a rubric in Microsoft Teams.
Rubric for the first project on IDM Design - HTML and CSS Intermediate

Visual Layout

- Page looks like the design provided or created
- Margins, spacing and padding are similar 
- Font is displayed properly
- Colors match design
- Content is centered with a max-width of 1440p
- Button is uses transitions
- Link has a title attribute

CSS

- Appropriate CSS selectors are used 
- BEM class system used properly
- CSS has proper indentation
- Classes are used to select HTML elements
- Proper CSS syntax is maintained: selector, curly braces, property, colon, value, semicolon
- Font types are similar to design
- Font shorthand is used
- Font sizes/weight and alignment are similar to design
- CSS is organized hierarchically using BEM
- CSS is organized in its own folder
- Uses core.css, theme.css and main.css appropriately
- BEM is error-free

HTML

- HTML5 block elements & divs are used
- Proper semantic HTML is used for grouping and nesting
- HTML document has proper indentation, demonstrating correct HTML hierarchy
- Spelling, grammar, punctuation, etc. 
- Naming classes has proper meaning to the content being displayed on the page
- Uses relative paths
- Indicated elements are used semantically
- Markup validates without errors

Edge

- Submitted on time
- Submitted correctly
- Files are named correctly
- Folders are named correctly
- Research skills are used to search previously unseen CSS properties
- Research skills are used to identify colors from a design
